overview: In modern-day Hollywood where movie stars are royalty, wannabes are cynics, and networking is the only reason to throw an after-party, can a hopeless romantic get the fairy-tale ending of his dreams? The Cinderella Effect is a gay-themed, musical romp into that very possibility. Full of original songs, tongue-in-cheek humor, and classic film genre staples, The Cinderella Effect is that rare Hollywood love-story that invites its audience to love Hollywood just as much as its two love-struck characters do.
title: The Cinderella Effect
